item.title: Lognormal block kriging with application to goal geology
item.description: featured: true image: caption: “ focal_point: “” preview_only: false projects: [] publication: ‘Journal of Statistical Computation and Simulation, 89(11)’ publication_short: “” publication_types: - “2” summary: This paper proposes a method of selecting the knot locations for reduced rank spatial models, which are useful when the number of spatial locations is veyr large. tags: - Source Themes title: Threshold knot selection for large-scale spatial models with applications to the Deepwater Horizon disaster url_code: “” url_dataset: “” url_pdf: “” url_poster: “” url_project: “” url_slides: “” url_source: “” url_video: “”
